fixes.name: Customer_Lifetime_Sales
fixes.solution_explanation: The Tableau FIXED LOD { FIXED [CustomerID] : SUM([LineTotal]) } computes a customer-level aggregate that ignores other row/context filters. In DAX this is achieved with CALCULATE over SUM of LineTotal while removing all filters except CustomerID using ALLEXCEPT on the same table.
fixes.type_changed_reason: This calculation uses a Tableau FIXED LOD expression (aggregate/context-based), so it should be created as a measure.
